name: image-brightness-adjuster
title: Image Brightness Adjuster
content:
Overview

This application adjusts image brightness and contrast to improve visibility and appearance. Built using Pillow, it uses professional enhancement algorithms to brighten and add contrast to your images with optimal default settings.

Features

  • Brightness adjustment (default: 20% brighter)
  • Contrast enhancement (default: 10% more contrast)
  • Preserves original file format
  • Optimized quality settings

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates an adjusted image with the suffix _adjusted in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Brightening dark photos
  • Enhancing contrast for better visibility
  • Improving underexposed images
  • Preparing images for presentations
command: rm -rf prod_apps || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python prod_apps/python/image_brightness_adjuster.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -b 1.2 -c 1.1
